scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated on a throne, holding the Christ Child. To the left, an angel with golden and blue wings plays a lute. The figures are positioned within an architectural setting that includes a large arched window with diamond-shaped panes, revealing a landscape with trees and birds outside. The floor is tiled with a blue and yellow geometric pattern. A blue canopy with gold ornamentation is visible above the throne. The overall impression is one of serene domesticity and divine presence, suggesting a devotional scene.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with an Angel
